title: Buckles Me Baby
description: When Audrey Holtz and Damian Baker take Raeve’s belt buckles from Music City favorites to home shopping channel bestsellers, they are forced to face overnight fame. Orders and interview requests abound, but when Audrey learns she’s pregnant with Damian’s baby, so do morning sickness and mood swings. Can they handle the pressure of big business with a baby on the way, especially when they’re suddenly dodging paparazzi hell?
author: D.D. Scott
